choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds
### Assistant:

Here is a sample meal plan that meets your dietary restrictions:

* Breakfast: Oatmeal with berries and a drizzle of maple syrup. (Note: Maple syrup contains small amounts of dairy, so you may want to use a dairy-free alternative.)
* Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocado. Dressing: olive oil and lemon juice. (Note: Olive oil is okay, but be sure to check the label of any store-bought dressings for dairy or other restrictions.)
* Snack: Carrots and hummus. (Note: Be sure to choose a dairy-free hummus.)
* Dinner: Grilled salmon with roasted vegetables (such as broccoli, cauliflower, and bell peppers). (Note: Be sure to check the seasonings used on the vegetables for any dairy or other restrictions.)

Remember to always double-check labels and ingredients to ensure that all foods are safe for you to eat.
